content:
I apologize for the oversight. The Marleen Barr article I was referring to is "Science Fiction and the Politics of the Future" and it was published in the journal Cultural Critique in 1989. Here is the full citation for the article:

Barr, M. (1989). Science fiction and the politics of the future. Cultural Critique, 12, 163-179.

This article can potentially be accessed through a library that has a subscription to Cultural Critique or through interlibrary loan services.
